snippet: A man for whom life was combat, Mr. Ben Bella fought both for and against France, and in Algeria he went from being the president to being a prisoner.
abstract: Ahmed Ben Bella, revolutionary who led Algeria after its independence, dies at age 93.
lead_paragraph: A man for whom life was combat, Mr. Ben Bella fought both for and against France, and in Algeria he went from being the president to being a prisoner.

headline.seo: Ahmed Ben Bella, First President of an Independent Algeria, Dies at 93
headline.main: Ahmed Ben Bella, Revolutionary Who Led Algeria After Independence, Dies at 93
headline.print_headline: Ahmed Ben Bella, Revolutionary Who Led Algeria After Independence, Dies at 93
